title: Cerebras-GPT: A Family of Open, Compute-Efficient, Large Language Models
dot:
digraph CerebrasGPT{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];Abstract[label="State-of-the-art LLMs
require huge compute budgets,
complex techniques,
and deep ML expertise.
Cerebras-GPT addresses this
with open-source models,
faster training, lower costs,
and less energy consumption.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];OpenLLM[label="Cerebras-GPT: Open LLM Development
Open, reproducible, royalty-free
for research and commercial use.
Trained using the Chinchilla formula
and Apache 2.0 license.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];ScalingLaw[label="New Scaling Law
Establishes relationship between
training compute and model performance
using the open Pile dataset.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];ModelPerformance[label="Model Performance on Downstream Tasks
Cerebras-GPT shows state-of-the-art
training efficiency for downstream tasks.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightpink];CS2Training[label="Cerebras CS-2: Simple, Data-Parallel Training
Allows easy scaling without
complex parallelism techniques.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightcyan];Conclusion[label="Conclusion
Democratizing large models
requires both training infrastructure
and open-source models.
Cerebras-GPT serves as a recipe
for efficient training and research.", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightsalmon];ComputeBudget[label="Huge Compute Budgets", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];ComplexTechniques[label="Complex Distributed Compute Techniques", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];DeepMLExpertise[label="Deep ML Expertise", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];OpenDatasets[label="Open Datasets", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];ChinchillaFormula[label="Chinchilla Formula", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];Apache2License[label="Apache 2.0 License", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];PileDataset[label="Pile Dataset", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];DownstreamTasks[label="Downstream Tasks", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];DataParallel[label="Data-Parallel Training", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];WaferScaleCluster[label="Wafer-Scale Cluster", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];CloudAccess[label="Cloud Access via Cerebras AI Model Studio", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];Abstract->ComputeBudget;Abstract->ComplexTechniques;Abstract->DeepMLExpertise;OpenLLM->OpenDatasets;OpenLLM->ChinchillaFormula;OpenLLM->Apache2License;ScalingLaw->PileDataset;ModelPerformance->DownstreamTasks;CS2Training->DataParallel;CS2Training->WaferScaleCluster;Conclusion->CloudAccess;Abstract->OpenLLM[label="Cerebras-GPT addresses"];OpenLLM->ScalingLaw[label="New Scaling Law"];ScalingLaw->ModelPerformance[label="Performance on"];ModelPerformance->CS2Training[label="Training with"];CS2Training->Conclusion[label="Democratizing"];}
